channel.title: attack.t1070.001 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1070.001 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Security Event Log Cleared
item.description: Checks for event id 1102 which indicates the security event log was cleared.

item.title: Windows Defender Malware Detection History Deletion
item.description: Windows Defender logs when the history of detected infections is deleted. Log file will contain the message “Windows Defender Antivirus has removed history of malware and other potentially unwanted software”.

item.title: NotPetya Ransomware Activity
item.description: Detects NotPetya ransomware activity in which the extracted passwords are passed back to the main module via named pipe, the file system journal of drive C is deleted and windows eventlogs are cleared using wevtutil

item.title: Disable or Delete Windows Eventlog
item.description: Detects command that is used to disable or delete Windows eventlog via logman Windows utility

item.title: Suspicious Eventlog Clear or Configuration Using Wevtutil
item.description: Detects clearing or configuration of eventlogs using wevtutil, powershell and wmic. Might be used by ransomwares during the attack (seen by NotPetya and others).
